com.jme3.anim

Class MatrixJointModelTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.anim.MatrixJointModelTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JointModelTransform

    public class MatrixJointModelTransform
extends java.lang.Object
implements JointModelTransform
    This JointModelTransform implementation accumulate joints transforms in a Matrix4f to properly support non uniform scaling in an armature hierarchy
